title: Automated Alerts for Health Monitoring
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive automated alerts for abnormal health readings so that I can stay informed about my health without feeling monitored.

title: Medication Adherence Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to remind me of my medication schedule so that I can maintain my health without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Emergency Health Monitoring
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to monitor my health status in real-time and share it with my family, so that I can feel secure and maintain my independence without feeling overly monitored.

title: Long-term Health Tracking for Cognitive Maintenance
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to visualize my health trends over time so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and feel empowered about my well-being without feeling monitored.

title: Voice-Guided Medication Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want voice-guided medication reminders so that I can manage my health independently without feeling monitored.

title: Health Improvement Goal-Setting
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to set and track my health improvement goals so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and stay engaged in my active lifestyle without feeling monitored.
